snippet.title: Pirates Kingdom
snippet.description:
Arr, matey! Here be pirates! Prepare to set sail across the vast and ocean, searching for lost treasure and secret islands. Build new civilizations in uncharted territories and play exciting hidden object games to find treasure chests full of gold, gems and precious loot. All this and more in Pirates Kingdom!

Men Overboard!
It's an epic tale of survival and discovery: shipwrecked pirates stuck on a mysterious island in the middle of the ocean. With a ruined pier, a damaged boat and no prospects of rescue, there's only one way to sate the crew's appetite for food, grog and adventure. It's time to build a pirate cove!

Corsair... Culture?!
Build a new civilization from scratch -- a community of privateers, raiders, freebooters and other swashbuckling scoundrels!  Use the island's limited resources wisely and strategically. Build up a pirate village by constructing important infrastructure like houses, ship-building facilities, and grog-houses. Slowly rebuild your damaged ship and prevent your crew from degenerating into mere landlubbers!

Set Sail
Provide your crew with a new life of adventure on the high seas! Explore and unravel the secrets of the mysterious archipelago you've been stranded in. Traverse dark caves and nearby islands in search of rare and exotic flora, hidden objects, lost treasures, forgotten tools, artifacts, resources, and much more! Finally, completely repair and upgrade your ship to travel to the furthest reaches of the deep blue!

Features:
- Enjoy scenic cartoon graphics with a pirate theme 
- Exciting, addictive and challenging gameplay
- Various tools, buildings and decorations to choose from
- Upgrade your facilities for a better sea-dog lifestyle
- User-friendly quest menu
- Hassle-free controls and easy gameplay
- Repair and upgrade your ship for adventure travel
- Discover copious amounts of pirate booty and loot!

*** For the best experience, playing the game on tablets and phones with 4.3 inch display or higher is recommended ***
